title: Haven't played since Braum released, quick run down for how the game is currently?
body: Started playing around 2010-2011 and stopped at the end of 2014 not long after Braum was released. I've decided to get back into the game but it's so overwhelming the amount that has changed since then. Any tips for a returning player? Thanks dudes

replies.body:
Big changes:

+ At 10 minutes this thing called **Rift Herald** spawns in the Baron pit. Take it for a 20 minute buff on your auto-attacks (it persists 
through death as well).


+ There's 4 different Dragons now; Infernal, Cloud, Ocean, and Mountain Drakes. They each give a different kind of buff when killed.


+ After 35 minutes the **Elder Dragon** spawns. He gives a buff + makes your previous Dragon buffs stronger.


+ **Plants** now exist in the jungle. No one below Platinum actually knows how to use them though. One gives free health, the other is a Ziggs satchel, and the last one is a giant cone that gives vision.


+  There have been 14 champions since **Braum**:
  + **[Gnar](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Gnar)**
  + **[Azir](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Azir)**
  + **[Kalista](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Kalista)**
  + **[Rek'Sai](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Rek%27Sai)**
  + **[Bard](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Bard)**
  + **[Ekko](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ekko)**
  + **[Tahm Kench](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Tahm_Kench)**
  + **[Kindred](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Kindred)**
  + **[Illaoi](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Illaoi)**
  + **[Jhin](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Jhin)**
  + **[Aurelion Sol](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Aurelion_Sol)**
  + **[Taliyah](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Taliyah)**
  + **[Kled](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Kled)**
  + **[Ivern](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ivern)**

Other:


+ There's a [new Client](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017/client) now.


+ After a PR catastrophe, we now have ranked Flex Queue (for playing with groups of 1,2,3, and 5) in addition to Solo/Duo Queue.


+ [Replays](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/road-pre-season-replays-horizon) actually arrived.


+ [Sandbox Mode](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/road-pre-season-practice-tool-works) is coming too.

Apart from that, it's basically still the same :D
Appreciate the time you took to type this out for me. Very helpful
Thanks man, I'm always happy to help :D

Somebody give this man a cookie.

Also the assassin rework. Look into that.
